# iosxr_interface_bvi (Data Source)

This data source can read the Interface BVI configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_interface_bvi" "example" {
  name = "BVI100"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Interface configuration subcommands

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `arp_cache_limit` (Number) Set cache limit for ARP entries
- `arp_gratuitous_ignore` (Boolean) Ignore the receipt of Gratuitous ARP packets
- `arp_learning_disable` (Boolean) Disable dynamic learning of ARP entries
- `arp_learning_local` (Boolean) Enable dynamic learning only for local subnet only
- `arp_timeout` (Number) Set ARP cache timeout
- `bandwidth` (Number) Set the bandwidth of an interface
- `dampening` (Boolean) configure state dampening on the given interface
- `dampening_decay_half_life` (Number) Decay half life (in minutes)
- `dampening_max_suppress_time` (Number) Max suppress time (in minutes)
- `dampening_reuse_threshold` (Number) Reuse threshold
- `dampening_suppress_threshold` (Number) Suppress threshold
- `description` (String) Set description for this interface
- `host_routing` (Boolean) Enable host-routing on this interface
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.

- `ipv4_mask_reply` (Boolean) Enable sending ICMP mask reply messages
- `ipv4_mtu` (Number) Set IPv4 Maximum Transmission Unit
- `ipv4_netmask` (String) IP subnet mask

- `ipv6_link_local_zone` (String) IPv6 address zone
- `ipv6_mtu` (Number) Set IPv6 Maximum Transmission Unit
- `ipv6_nd_cache_limit` (Number) Set Cache Limit for neighbor entry
- `ipv6_nd_dad_attempts` (Number) Set IPv6 Duplicate Address Detection Transmits
- `ipv6_nd_managed_config_flag` (Boolean) Hosts should use stateful protocol for address config
- `ipv6_nd_ns_interval` (Number) Set advertised NS retransmission interval
- `ipv6_nd_other_config_flag` (Boolean) Hosts should use stateful protocol for non-address config
- `ipv6_nd_prefix_default_no_adv` (Boolean) Do not advertise prefix
- `ipv6_nd_prefix_default_no_autoconfig` (Boolean) Do not use prefix for autoconfiguration
- `ipv6_nd_ra_interval_max` (Number) Set IPv6 Router Advertisement Interval

- `mac_address` (String) Set the Mac address(xxxx.xxxx.xxxx) on an interface
- `mtu` (Number) Set the MTU on an interface
- `multipoint` (Boolean) multipoint sub-interface
- `point_to_point` (Boolean) point-to-point sub-interface
- `proxy_arp` (Boolean) Enable proxy ARP
- `ptp` (Boolean) Precision Time Protocol config

- `ptp_announce_timeout` (Number) Configure the announce timeout value

- `ptp_dscp_general` (Number) Specify the DSCP value to use

- `ptp_interop_ingress_conversion_priority2` (Number) The priority2 value to use for the peer clock

- `ptp_multicast_disable` (Boolean) Disable multicast transport

- `ptp_multicast_target_address_mac_non_forwardable` (Boolean) Non-forwardable mac-address

- `ptp_port_state_master_only` (Boolean) Restrict the port state to primary
- `ptp_port_state_slave_only` (Boolean) Restrict the port state to subordinate

- `ptp_source_ipv6_address_disable` (Boolean) Use the interface IPv6 address

- `service_policy_output` (Attributes List) Configure a policy in the output direction (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--service_policy_output))
- `shutdown` (Boolean) shutdown the given interface
- `vrf` (String) Set VRF in which the interface operates

<a id="nestedatt--ptp_master_ethernets"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ptp_master_ethernets`

Read-Only:

- `address` (String) Ethernet address
- `clock_class` (Number) Override the clock-class of this primary
- `delay_asymmetry` (Number) The expected delay asymmetry for this primary
- `microseconds` (Boolean) Use microseconds as the delay asymmetry units
- `milliseconds` (Boolean) Use milliseconds as the delay asymmetry units
- `multicast` (Boolean) Whether this primary sends messages multicast
- `multicast_mixed` (Boolean) Mixed-mode multicast
- `nanoseconds` (Boolean) Use nanoseconds as the delay asymmetry units
- `non_negotiated` (Boolean) Use non-negotiated unicast
- `priority` (Number) Specify the priority of this primary
